metadata.title: Snaqy - AI-Powered Nutrition Tracking Made Simple
metadata.description: Track your diet with a photo. Snaqy automatically analyzes your meals with AI and helps you reach your nutritional goals. Free and simple.
metadata.keywords: food tracking, calorie counter, nutrition tracker, food diary, AI calorie calculator, macro tracking

hero.title: Track your diet
hero.description: Snaqy uses artificial intelligence to automatically analyze your meals and help you reach your nutritional goals. No more manual entry for each food item.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to track your diet

photo.title: Take a photo
photo.description: Photograph your meal, whether it's a main course, dessert, or snack.

analysis.title: AI analyzes
analysis.description: Our artificial intelligence automatically identifies foods and calculates nutritional values.

tracking.title: Track your progress
tracking.description: View your daily, weekly, and monthly statistics to reach your goals.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Features designed to simplify your nutrition tracking

aiAnalysis.title: Smart AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our AI automatically detects the components of your dish: proteins, carbs, fats, and calories.

multiPhoto.title: Multiple Photos
multiPhoto.description: Add multiple photos per meal to capture your appetizer, main course, and dessert separately.

stats.title: Detailed Statistics
stats.description: Visualize your consumption day by day, week by week, or month by month.

goals.title: Personalized Goals
goals.description: AI calculates your ideal caloric needs based on your profile: height, weight, gender, and physical activity.

sharing.title: Sharing & Collaboration
sharing.description: Share your meals with a nutritionist or friend for remote monitoring.

location.title: Geolocation
location.description: Locate each meal to remember where you ate that delicious dish.

notes.title: Personal Notes
notes.description: Add notes to each meal to track your feelings and preferences.

socialShare.title: Meal Sharing
socialShare.description: Share a meal with someone else to avoid duplicates during shared meals.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, upgrade to Pro when you're ready

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect to start your nutrition tracking

items.question: Can I use Snaqy for free?
items.answer: Yes, Snaqy is completely free with full features. The Pro subscription adds automatic AI analysis of your meal photos.

items.question: How does AI analysis work?
items.answer: With the Pro subscription, simply take a photo of your meal and our AI automatically identifies foods and calculates nutritional values.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your information with third parties.

cta.title: Ready to transform your diet?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who track their diet simply with Snaqy.

about.title: About Snaqy
about.subtitle: A simple solution for nutrition tracking accessible to everyone

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: We believe nutrition tracking should be simple, accessible, and free for everyone. Snaqy was born from this conviction: enabling everyone to better understand their diet without complexity.

story.title: Our story
story.description: Snaqy was created by nutrition and technology enthusiasts who were tired of complicated and expensive apps. We developed a solution that gets to the essentials: take a photo, get nutritional information, track your progress.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Snaqy is an open source project. We believe in transparency and community. Everyone can contribute to improving the application.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: An intuitive interface that gets straight to the point

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Open source code and secure data

items.title: Innovation
items.description: AI at the service of your health

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: A question, a suggestion? We're here to help

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.subjectPlaceholder: What is the subject of your message?
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

items.question: How can I create an account?
items.answer: Click on 'Get started for free' and follow the instructions to create your account in seconds.

items.question: Is the app available on mobile?
items.answer: Yes, Snaqy is a progressive web app (PWA) that works perfectly on mobile, tablet, and computer.

items.question: How do I share my meals with my nutritionist?
items.answer: In your account settings, you can add access for your nutritionist who can then track your meals remotely.

footer.description: Track your diet simply with AI.
